data.title: Weekly Social Dance Parties — Ballroom Dance Lessons
data.meta_description: Whether you’re interested in wedding dance lessons, a new hobby or way to connect with your partner, improving your social life, physical or emotional well-being, or taking your skills to the next level, you’ve come to the right place — and we’re happy you’re here. Our unique teaching method include
data.meta_site_name: Ballroom Dance Lessons | Fred Astaire Boise
data.text:
“My husband and I initially went to learn dances for our son's wedding. It has become such a great part of our life and we highly recommend it!”

— Paige S, October 2023

The Right Lessons for You

No matter why you’re interested in ballroom dance lessons, you’ve come to the right place. At Fred Astaire Boise, we see everything from couples learning something new together to experienced dancers who want to take their skills to the next level, and soon to be wed couples looking for wedding dance lessons. Don’t have a partner? No problem, there’s always someone ready to hit the floor with you.

Introductory Lessons

First, let’s get to know each other! Whether you think you have two left feet, or you’ve been dancing for years, we will learn about your goals and try out different dance styles to design your personalized dance program.

Intro Private Lesson for $40

OR Two Private Lessons for $75

What’s Next?

Our Level 2 Social Foundation program and Level 3 Trophy System are next on the horizon! We’ll work with you to customize your dance journey and add to your mastery of the basic elements of social dance. Get ready to shine on the floor!

Dance Programs Customized to Your Goals!

Wedding Dance Lessons

We know how important your wedding day is, and we’re here to make it even more special. Fred Astaire Boise customizes our wedding dance instruction programs just for you. We can give you the confidence and skills to show off your elegance, style and personality, making magical wedding memories that will last a lifetime.

Visit our online store to purchase a fully customized wedding dance lesson program for you and your partner, or for a couple you love!

First Dance

Your first dance is an expression of love and commitment — for you and your new spouse, as well as for the special guests celebrating with you. From a few simple steps to get by to a fully choreographed routine, we can help make your first dance as unique as the rest of your wedding day.

Father/Daughter

A memorable father/daughter (and mother/son!) dance is a wonderful complement to your first dance. Including your parents (or the special friends or family members who will be standing in that traditional role) in your wedding dance is a wonderful way to show your love and appreciation.

Dance Routines

Looking for something really memorable? We can choreograph a “YouTube-worthy” wedding dance for the whole wedding party that’s set to your favorite music! Extend those special wedding day moments with an awesome routine you’ll want to re-live, again and again.

Online Dance Lessons

The Fred Astaire Dance Studios® Online Trophy System is an exciting new online training program created exclusively for our students to complement and enhance private lesson progress and help guide you even further on your dance journey!

Learn more, faster, and with better retention

Practice new dance patterns you’ve just learned

Perfect the patterns you’re already practicing

Great for quick run-throughs and longer practice sessions

No need to wait for your next lesson!

Convenient 24/7 access from your Student Dashboard
